titleStmt.title: City and County of San Francisco

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: City and County of San Francisco

body.p: Administrative body for the city and county of San Francisco, California. Civil War-era mayors: Henry F. Teschemacher (Oct. 3, 1859 - June 30, 1863) and Henry Perrin Coon (July 1, 1863 - Dec. 1, 1867).

ab.bibl:
"Government," City and County of San Francisco, March 16, 2012, Archive.org, accessed September 23, 2021, https://web.archive.org/web/20120316222315/http://www6.sfgov.org/index.aspx?page=4.
"San Francisco Mayors," City and County of San Francisco, December 3, 2003, Archive.org, accessed July 8, 2021, https://web.archive.org/web/20031203021947/http://www.sfgov.org/site/mainpages_index.asp?id=21117.
